{{Infobox Radio station |image = | |name = ABC South East NSW |callsign = 2BA |coordinates = {{Coord|36|40|25.89|S|149|50|25.41|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 1956 |frequency = 810 [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] South East NSW
1602 [[Kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] Monaro
103.5 [[Megahertz|mHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]] Batemans Bay and Moruya |area = [[South Coast (New South Wales)|South Coast]] and [[Monaro (New South Wales)|Monaro]] |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] |website = http://www.abc.net.au/southeastnsw/ }} '''ABC South East NSW''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Bega, New South Wales|Bega]]. It broadcasts to the southern part of the [[South Coast (New South Wales)|South Coast]] and the [[Monaro (New South Wales)|Monaro]] regions in [[New South Wales]]. This includes the towns of [[Cooma, New South Wales|Cooma]], [[Batemans Bay, New South Wales|Batemans Bay]], [[Moruya, New South Wales|Moruya]] and [[Eden, New South Wales|Eden]]. The station began as '''2BA''' and '''2CP''' in 1956 and is heard on these main [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] frequencies along with a number of FM repeaters; * 103.5 FM [[Batemans Bay, New South Wales|Batemans Bay]], [[Moruya, New South Wales|Moruya]] * 106.3 FM [[Eden, New South Wales|Eden]] * 94.1 FM [[Bombala, New South Wales|Bombala]] * 95.5 FM [[Jindabyne, New South Wales|Jindabyne]] * 88.9 FM [[Thredbo, New South Wales|Thredbo]] The [[Batemans Bay, New South Wales|Batemans Bay]], [[Eden, New South Wales|Eden]] and [[Bombala, New South Wales|Bombala]] translators are known as "2BA/T", whilst those in [[Jindabyne, New South Wales|Jindabyne]] and [[Thredbo, New South Wales|Thredbo]] are known as "2CP/T". ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== * Breakfast with Ian Campbell â 6:00 AM to 7:45 AM * Mornings with Tim Holt â 8:30 AM to 11:00 AM ===Saturday=== * Saturday Breakfast with Sophie Longden â 6:00 AM to 7:45 AM * Saturday South East Sport with Leigh Hardingham â 8:30 AM to 9:00 AM * Gardening Talkback with Margaret Sirl â 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[702 ABC Sydney]]. ==References== * {{cite web |title=ABC Bega Station History |url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/03/11/2186510.htm |date=2003-03-11 |accessdate=2008-06-06 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc South East Nsw}} [[Category:Radio stations in New South Wales]] [[Category:South Coast, New South Wales]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1956]]
